title: Moto G Stylus (2022) goes official with 90Hz display, 5,000 mAh battery, and no 5G support
content:
Motorola’s Moto G series was once the best of the budget space, but the market has evolved and created a lot more competition. Today, Motorola is officially announcing the Moto G Stylus (2022), with an updated design and spec sheet, and one bizarre omission.

more…

The post Moto G Stylus (2022) goes official with 90Hz display, 5,000 mAh battery, and no 5G support appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Moto G Stylus (2022) delivers a faster display and better overall specs, but the phone bizarrely lacks 5G and launches with Android 11.
